description: Shibumi is a corrupt politician who employs assassins. He employs Udou Jin`e, Akamatsu Arundo, and Saitou Hajime. Shibumi orders Saitou to kill Kenshin, not knowing that Saitou is in actuality allied to Ookubo Toshimichi. After Saitou appears at Shibumi`s place and kills Arundo, Shibumi begs for his life and offers money to Saitou; Saitou refuses and kills Shibumi.
name: Shibumi
